meanings.definition: Having the same or similar structure or origin
meanings.sent1: The twins had isologous smiles, making it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The isologous patterns on the wallpaper matched perfectly at every corner.
meanings.sent3: The isologous colors of the socks made them look like a pair of twins.
meanings.sent4: The isologous melodies of the two songs blended seamlessly into one beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The isologous shapes of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The isologous gears in the machine worked together smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The isologous keys on the piano produced a harmonious sound.
meanings.sent3: The isologous tools in the toolbox seemed to have a secret language of their own.
meanings.sent4: The isologous movements of the dancers created a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The isologous parts of the engine fit perfectly into place.

meanings.definition: Relating to a similarity in characteristics or properties
meanings.sent1: The isologous traits between the siblings were strikingly evident.
meanings.sent2: The isologous flavors of the dishes made it hard to choose a favorite.
meanings.sent3: The isologous behavior of the pets made them seem like mirror images of each other.
meanings.sent4: The isologous paths of the rivers converged into a single stream.
meanings.sent5: The isologous features of the faces made them look like they were related.
